Khangura  is a village in Phagwara tehsil in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located  from Kapurthala and  from Phagwara. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village.
Transport
Phagwara Junction and Mauli Halt are the closest railway stations to Khangura. The station at Jalandhar City is  away. The village is  from Sri Guru Ram Dass Jee International Airport in Amritsar. Another nearby facility is Sahnewal Airport in Ludhiana,  distant. Phagwara, Jandiala, Jalandhar, Phillaur are the nearby cities to Khangura village.
